an3.142:4.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, bhadre assājānīye desessāmi tayo ca bhadre purisājānīye.
an3.142:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.142:4.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an3.142:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro assājānīyo … pe …
an3.142:5.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā assājānīyā.
an3.142:6.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā?
an3.142:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro purisājānīyo … pe …
an3.142:6.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:7.2: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.142:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.142:7.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an3.142:7.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhadro purisājānīyo javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:7.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā”ti.
